document_data.name: Mosquito Fever
document_data.mainbody: '''Mosquito fever''' was a [[disease]] known to the people of [[Halruaa]].
document_data.Acquisition: It was named for [[mosquito]]s, whose bites could spread diseases like it.
document_data.Effects: The disease racked the suffer with both a burning fever and numbness.
document_data.History: In the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]], the disease's symptoms made it useful as a metaphor for feeling angry but unable to act.
